author: COMSOL
description: This example demonstrates the modeling of convection and conduction in porous media. Here fluid movement is driven entirely by buoyant rise due to density variations with temperature. The results are compared with a published study.
label: convection_porous_medium.mph
name: root

settings.value: Plane layers parallel to heat flow

title: Free Convection in a Porous Medium
